caption.p: Effects of olaparib on influenza virus challenge-induced PARylated protein content and p65, IκBα phosphorylation in lung tissues at day 6 post-infection ( n = 8 for each group). Western blot analysis of PARylated protein content (a) and p-p65, p65, p- IκBα, and IκBα (b) in lung samples from each experimental group. The relative expressions were normalized to control (c, d, e). Data are presented as mean ± SD. ## p < 0.01 and ### p < 0.001 compared with the control. ** p < 0.01 and *** p < 0.001 compared with IAV
